alert.note: Alert for Logan County; Morgan County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 23 at 9:57AM MDT until June 26 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Colorado... South Platte River near Balzac affecting Washington County, Morgan County and Logan County zones. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...South Platte River near Balzac. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Agricultural land floods along the river near Sterling. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM MDT Friday the stage was 8.6 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.

area.areaDesc: Logan County; Morgan County; Washington County
